verses.verse: Blessed <S%H835><s%> is every one that fears <S%H3373><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%>; that walks <S%H1980><s%> in his ways <S%H1870><s%>.
For you shall eat <S%H398><s%> the labor <S%H3018><s%> of your hands <S%H3709><s%>: happy <S%H835><s%> shall you be <S%H2896><s%>, and it shall be well with you.

Your wife <S%H802><s%> shall be as a fruitful <S%H6509><s%> vine <S%H1612><s%> by the sides <S%H3411><s%> of your house <S%H1004><s%>: your sons <S%H1121><s%> like olive <S%H2132><s%> plants <S%H8363><s%> round about <S%H5439><s%> your table <S%H7979><s%>.
Behold <S%H1397><s%>, that thus shall the man be blessed <S%H1288><s%> that fears <S%H3373><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%>.

The Lord <S%H3068><s%> shall bless <S%H1288><s%> you out of Zion <S%H6726><s%>: and you shall see <S%H7200><s%> the good <S%H2898><s%> of Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> all the days <S%H3117><s%> of your life <S%H2416><s%>.
Yes <S%H7200><s%>, you shall see your children <S%H1121><s%>'s sons <S%H1121><s%>, and peace <S%H7965><s%> upon Israel <S%H3478><s%>.
